movies.title: Blade runner 2049
movies.remarks: You have never experience a miracle (Nigdy nie doświadczyłeś cudu). We all are searching for something real (Wszyscy szukamy czegoś prawdziwego). Przechodzenie / voise (głos). Everyone thinks that details matter. This is not the way the memory works. The fealings are important Wszyscy myślą, że liczą się szczegóły. To nie tak działa pamięć. Ważne są uczucia.) Ways how to reponsd (Sposoby odpowiedzi). If you were designed. Love or mathematical precision - predistination (predystynacja). Black eyes (Czarne oczy)

movies.title: Constantine
movies.remarks: 'Heaven and hell are right here. Behind every wall, every window. The world behind the world, and we're smack in the middle. ... The influence peddlers. They can only whisper in our ears, but a single world can give you courage or turn your favorite pleasure into your worst nightmare.' And farm hypo vs plan. You see them, they see you. Whatever killed the Son of God, will give birth to the son of the devil. You have to ask for absolution to be forgiven. 52 Time slowing down. There is a plan for all of us. He works His work in a mysterious ways.

movies.title: Star trek

linkedMovies.label: Star trek into darkness (Star trek: w ciemność.) - 2013

movies.remarks: Spock (Star Treck) / Homles (Arthur Conan Doyle): `Excluding impossible whatever stays must be the truth.` `If you're gonna ride in the Kentucky Derby, you don't leave your prize stallion in the stable. Spock: A curious metaphor, doctor, as a stallion must first be broken before it can reach its potential.` Mindhunters eye-patches; 1:22 (suppose vs can)

movies.title: Star trek into darkness
movies.remarks: I have sensed that you conscience. Without it I wouldn't have been able to convince you to the truth (I Wyczułem że ma pan sumienie. Bez tego nie zdołałbym przekonać pana do prawdy) - Khan. 4 numers as coordinates (4 liczby jako koordynaty). Coordinates - Europe - moon of Jupiter (Koordynaty - Europa - księżyc Jowisza). 1:10 - intelect + savagery.

movies.title: Stephanie
movies.remarks: Lack of support / understanding from parents. I am scared. Inside that's all you. All the way. The good and the bad. That's for you to control. That's for you to change. If you want to. The fear and the anger and the Doubt. They would call the monster.  When you've got those feelings, the bad feeling. All you have to do is to make them small. Don't let the bad things get big
